hevs.gdx2d.lib.interfaces

Interface GameInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortableApplication

    public interface GameInterface
    Contains the methods to handle the application lifecycle. This lifecycle is independent from the hardware it runs on.
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDispose()
      Called when the application stops.
      void onGameLogicUpdate()
      Called when the logic has to be updated.
      void onGraphicRender(GdxGraphics g)
      Called when the screen is refreshed, in sync with VSync
      void onInit()
      Called when the application starts.
      void onPause()
      Called when the application pauses (on Android).
      void onResume()
      Called when the application starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onInit

        void onInit()
        Called when the application starts. Initializations and creation of new new objects must be done here.

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Called when the application pauses (on Android).

      • onDispose

        void onDispose()
        Called when the application stops. Tidying up must be done here

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Called when the application starts. Initializations and creation of new new objects must be done here.

      • onGraphicRender

        void onGraphicRender(GdxGraphics g)
        Called when the screen is refreshed, in sync with VSync

      • onGameLogicUpdate

        void onGameLogicUpdate()
        Called when the logic has to be updated. Might not be called
